cause.description:
During the Days of July the 9th through the 16th we will be on a Missions trip to Trinidad. During the Day we will be hosting a Vacation Bible School. During the Afternoons we will be remodeling a 75 year old structure. This Structure will be used as an education center. The team consists of 7 teenagers and 8 adults. The approxiamate remaining cost is 4,500. Please Suport us through prayer and your gifts if you can.
1. God commands us to spread the Gospel
cause.name: Trinidad Work and Witness Trip
